bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum, double butted front triangle with 3D box gusset, reinforced disc mount, externally machined HT, forged alloy drop outs with eyelets and replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Manitou Axel Elite, 13" & 15" frame - 80mm travel, 17-23" frames - 100mm travel, mag lowers, coil/MCU spring, adjustable  rebound damping and preload, disc only, Cr-Mo steerer
1 1/8" threadless, black steel cups, loose ball bearings with seals
Alloy 10 degree rise, TIG welded, black
Shimano M-510 Deore, 34.9mm clamp, bottom pull
44t AL-7075 x 32t heat-treated Cr-Mo x 22t heat-treated Cr-Mo, replaceable
Truvativ, 68x113mm, square taper, sealed cartridge bearing w/ double crank stops
Alloy body, alloy cage, toe clips and straps
Joy-Tech, 32 hole, ground race double sealed loose ball with alloy QR
Joy-Tech, freehub, 32 hole, ground race double sealed loose ball w/ alloy QR
1.8mm (15g) black stainless, brass nipples, L264/R264mm front, L263/R262mm rear
Specialized Roll X 26 x 2.0", wire bead
Specialized Roll X 26 x 2.0", wire bead
Chain stay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
